name: Jail Fight
description:
The game is a turn based fight management game. You will take your turn and try to make actions, every action can fail when it is executed. There's a combo system (avaible only as first action) where you can take the chance of making a 5 hits combo, if you correctly hit all buttons in the same order they appear, the combo can also fail when executed, but worth a try.

You will need a friend to play.
